caption: Attributed to Jean-Baptiste Deshays (French, 1729–1765), formerly attributed to Jean-Baptiste Deshays (French, 1729–1765), formerly attributed to François Boucher (1703–1770; born and died Paris, France), Head and upper torso of Diana.
